summary: This mod adds 7 children in Honorhall Orphanage. They are Rayce, Nimara, Sophia, Riente, Iriana, Sirone and Almern.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod. Please give me suggestions.

This mod adds 7 children in Honorhall Orphanage. They are Rayce, Nimara, Sophia, Riente, Iriana, Sirone and Almern. However, there is a glitch which prevents adoption. to adopt them, you need to do the following -

Simply select a child with the console. Note the ID that comes up, and type these commands: setrelationshiprank [Child ID] 4, setrelationshiprank player 4, addfac 3004290 1.(Replace the [Child ID] with their reference ID.) They should now give the adoption dialogue.

Anyone can use this mod and upload it, but you have to tell me, either by comment or by email. My email is rishusuperstar@gmail.com
author: Rishukingler11
